questions.question: 1. In cantilever beam, slope and deflection at free end is _____

explanations.c: In cantilever beam, the slope and deflection at free end is maximum.

questions.question: 2. Which of the following statements is/are true for a simply supported beam?

answers.a: Deflection at supports in a simply supported beam is maximum
answers.b: Deflection is maximum at a point where slope is zero
answers.c: Slope is minimum at supports in a simply supported beam

explanations.b: In simply supported beam the deflection is maximum at a point where slope is zero.

explanations.c: The slope-deflection equations relates Forces, moments and deformations

questions.question: 4. Why it is recommended to draw the bending moment diagram on the tension side

answers.b: Ease of visulization to structural design in deciding the face for reinforcement bars

explanations.b: It is recommended to draw the bending moment diagram on the tension side to provide ease of visulization to structural design in deciding the face for reinforcement bars
